titles.title: Clean and Managed Public Spaces Act
Clean and Managed Public Spaces Act
To prohibit camping on public property in the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 25 - 20.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. H. Rept. 119-342.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 294.

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary: This bill prohibits camping outdoors on public property in the District of Columbia. The penalty for a violation of the prohibition is a fine of up to $500, imprisonment for up to 30 days, or both.
